job.title: Web Developer and Software Engineer - ASP.NET C#
job.description:
Are you interested in helping to transform the way people communicate?


Multimedia Solutions is a cutting-edge digital consulting firm focused on revolutionizing the way our Fortune 2000 clients reach their clients. As a Website Developer and Software Engineer, your responsibilities will include designing, developing, and maintaining software application components using C# (programming language), ASP.NET, AJAX, Model-View Controller (MVC), JQuery, Web Services, XML, XSD, XSLT, etc.


If you embrace a close-knit small business environment and want to have a big impact on the firm, our clients, and your career, please read on.


 Software Developer Benefits

  • Opportunity to work on web development projects for Fortune 2000 companies
  • Opportunity to work on the Multimedia Solutions Digital Experience platform vision
  • Work with the latest programming technologies on websites, mobile computing, content management, and social media
  • Competitive salary with benefits, bonus opportunities, and training. Plus, you get to work with really smart people
  • A culture founded on the principles of excellence, respect, accountability, integrity, enjoyment, and diversity
  • The exciting and ideal work environment of feeling part of a start-up but yet in a company with a solid 28-year reputation
  • Health and Dental Benefits
  • H1 Sponsorship
  • 401K Plan


Requirements

  • C#
  • .NET
  • ASP.NET
  • ASP.NET MVC
  • Razor
  • Umbraco CMS or other .NET based CMS exposure 
  • JavaScript / AJAX
